ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: grats Sylly on the legs and John on the boots and 6nb.  on our server, legs seem to drop more than anything else, and boots the very least.  since the bard
ygData.messageBody:
grats Sylly on the legs and John on the boots and 6nb. on our server, legs
seem to drop more than anything else, and boots the very least. since the
bard armor was moved to hate, we only know of one boots ever dropping, but
we have gotten multiple legs on more than one occassion. i'm glad i got all
mine in fear. only piece i had to get in hate (other than the weapons/lute)
was arms.

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L45 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


>
> From: <kim@...>
>
> On Fri, 3 Mar 2000 kim@... wrote:
> >
> > Imbrued Platemail Boots: AC 16, +5 str, +9 sta, +10 magic
>
> Er, +10 cold, not magic.
>

> John H. Kim
